If you're a trader, don't trade one coin only. Mix it up and specialize in a few. Alts tend to move based on BTC's movement, but multiplied by a factor. For example, if BTC moves 5%, an alt could move 8-10%. EOS lately has had the biggest moves up and down. I follow the money.
